translation_rules: padConcat({inventory_id, src_filename, '', orig_stand_id, poly_id}, {4,15,10,10,7}, {'x','x','x','x','x'}, '-', TRUE, TRUE)
description: Concatenates five attributes to create CAS_ID
Stand structure is always SINGLE_LAYERED for forested polygons. Validation applies NOT_APPLICABLE unless polygon is forested.
Convert source area from m2 to ha. Report any zero values as OUT_OF_RANGE.
